text: Dog Man Directed by Peter Hastings Based on Dog Man by Dav Pilkey Produced by Karen Foster Starring * Pete Davidson * Lil Rel Howery * Isla Fisher * Poppy Liu * Stephen Root * Billy Boyd * Ricky Gervais Production company DreamWorks Animation Distributed by Universal Pictures Release date * January 31, 2025 (2025-01-31) Country United States Language English Dog Man is an 2025 American animated superhero comedy movie based on Dav Pilkey's children's graphic novel series Dog Man. It's being made by DreamWorks Animation and distributed by Universal Pictures. It is a spin-off of Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie (2017) and the second film in the Captain Underpants franchise. it's directed by Peter Hastings. The star voice actors are Pete Davidson, Lil Rel Howery, Isla Fisher, Poppy Liu, Stephen Root, Billy Boyd, and Ricky Gervais also Peter Hastings vocalizations of the titular character. The film was announced in December 2020. Hastings is going to direct after his other experience with Pilkey's work. Karen Foster joined as a producer in January 2024. Dog Man was released in the United States on January 31, 2025. == Premise == When a human police officer Knight and his dog Greg are injured together on the job, a life-saving surgery changes the course of history when Dog Man is born. Dog Man must protect and serve as he doggedly pursues the feline Petey the Cat, but the unexpected arrival of Lil Petey changes their dynamic. == Voice cast == * Pete Davidson as Petey, a cat who is Dog Man's archenemy. * Lil Rel Howery as Chief, the police chief of the station Dog Man works at. * Isla Fisher as Sarah Hatoff, a reporter. * Poppy Liu as Butler, Petey's assistant. * Stephen Root as Grampa, Petey's father. * Billy Boyd as Seamus, Sarah's cameraman. * Ricky Gervais as Flippy the Fish, a telekinetic fish. Additionally voices such as Peter Hastings as Dog Man vocalizations. ==References== Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movie spin-offs Category:DreamWorks Animation movies Category:2025 movies Category:2020s animated movies Category:2020s superhero movies Category:2020s comedy movies Category:American superhero movies Category:American comedy movies
title: Dog Man (movie)
